text: Mānavarē, nim'ma oḍeyanige an̄jiri mattu yāva tandeyū tanna maganige kin̄cittū upakarisalāgada hāgū yāva maganū tanna tandege kin̄cittū upakarisalāgada dinada bhaya nimagirali. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū allāhanu koṭṭa mātu satyavāgide. Innu, ī lōkada baduku nim'mannu van̄cisadirali mattu van̄cakanu nim'mannu allāhana viṣayadalli van̄cisadirali
